name: AdaWong Live 3D Wallpaper
description:
Ever wanted to have adawong dancing on your desktop, well now your dream has come true. This is a 3D wallaper. You can change outfit by pressing O.

You can change camera anngle by pressing 1,2,3

To exit just go to system tray rightclick icon and exit

This is windows only, Wont work on Mac or linux
